column1: Are there any beach restrictions at this time with COVID-19
Wear a mask while walking to and from the beach, maintain social distancing, and no groups larger than 10.

All beaches in Broward County ( which includes Pompano) are ordered closed for the Fourth of July weekend ( July 3-5) This was announced today.
